Syntax::Utility::AutoCriticalSection

Syntax::Utility::AutoCriticalSection Class Reference

Used to ensure a critical section is never left locked. More...

#include <AutoCriticalSection.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 AutoCriticalSection (CriticalSection &section)
 Create a new AutoCriticalSection.
 ~AutoCriticalSection (void)
 Delete the AutoCriticalSection, Unlocking the CriticalSection.

Detailed Description

Used to ensure a critical section is never left locked.

Use to ensure a critical section is never left in a locked state, even if an exception occurs. Avoids deadlocks. Requires a CriticalSection object. The section will automaticly be unlocked when the AutoCriticalSection goes out of scope.

Example:

			class MyClass
			{
				CriticalSection section;

				void Test()
				{
					...
					{
						//this will be lock, and then automaticly unlock at the end of the closes surrounding
						//scope.
						AutoCriticalSection autosection(section); 
						...
					}	//unlocks here
					...
				}

			}

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Syntax::Utility::AutoCriticalSection::AutoCriticalSection ( CriticalSection &  section  )  [inline]

Create a new AutoCriticalSection.

Enters the supplied CriticalSection. Will Leave the CriticalSection automaticly when the AutoCriticalSection is deleted.

Parameters:
section The CriticalSection to lock on. Imediatly Enters the section.
